text: melova jivitayehi (islamayata viruddhava) ovun viyadam karana vastuvehi upamava, ek sulangak men vanneya. eya (pramanaya ikmava giya) sitayak bavata pat vi (hima kunatuvak bavata patva), tamanta tamanma napurak kara gat ek samuhayakage goyamehi vædi, eya vinasa kara dæmiya. allah movunta kisima haniyak kale næta. ehet movun tamanta tamanma haniyak kara gatha
